definition: clean/completely/only/net (income, exports etc)/(Chinese opera) painted face male role
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The effect is basically the same as the home air purifier.
sentences.chinese: 其作用原理与家用的空气净化器基本上是相同的。

sentences.english: Purification and drying treatment of the reclaimed SF6 GAS.
sentences.chinese: 能对回收的SF6气体净化处理。

sentences.english: A carrier gas filter system is recommended to be installed on the Helium line (He).
sentences.chinese: 在氦气管路前面建议安装气体净化装置。

sentences.english: The importance of zinc powder full suspended in the purity process is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了在净化过程中锌粉全悬浮的重要性。

sentences.english: The purification of commercial aluminum by filtrating with high-efficient flux for removing inclusions and its mechanism were studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了熔剂过滤净化工业纯铝的效果及其净化机理。

sentences.english: The purification of commercial aluminum by filtrating with high-efficient flux for removing inclusions and its mechanism were studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了熔剂过滤净化工业纯铝的效果及其净化机理。

sentences.english: First, the body was washed and ritually purified.
sentences.chinese: 首先要清洗尸体，并且仪式性的净化尸体。

sentences.english: Air cleaner is a simple blowing equipment to purify the room.
sentences.chinese: 空气自净器是一种简单的室内净化送风设备。

sentences.english: Supply and install clarifier sludge outlet sluice valves.
sentences.chinese: 供应及安装净化污泥出路水闸阀门。

sentences.english: Like water can be made pure by distilling it.
sentences.chinese: 如同水可通过蒸馏净化。

sentences.english: This was a catharsis for us.
sentences.chinese: 对我们来说这是一种净化。

sentences.english: This paper worked on the pre-electrolysis process in silicon electrorefining.
sentences.chinese: 电解质的预电解净化是该方法成功的基础。

sentences.english: The mind is to be purified through bhakti.
sentences.chinese: 头脑要通过巴克提来净化。

sentences.english: Brine purifying is very important to productions of the vacuum salt.
sentences.chinese: 卤水净化是真空制盐的一个重要生产环节。

sentences.english: For the map carvers, you are clearing the road for the ascending children.
sentences.chinese: 对地图绘制者而言，你正在为提升孩童净化道路。

sentences.english: One of the most concentrated natural purification systems available, it can work in only 7 days.
sentences.chinese: 其中最集中的自然净化系统，它可以工作在只有7天。

definition: to clear away/to eliminate/to get rid of
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
